title: Initialize workspace and copy templates
acceptance: workspace模板文件齐全（含 error sinks: QUALITY_GATE/RUN_ERRORS）

title: Draft kickoff questions + seed queries (ideation)
acceptance: DECISIONS含C0问题块；queries.md 含非空关键词（可被后续 idea-brief 重写为多桶检索计划）

title: Idea brief: lock scope/constraints/rubric + multi-query buckets
acceptance: IDEA_BRIEF.md 含 scope/constraints/exclusions/rubric/stop rules/query buckets；queries.md 设定 `draft_profile: idea_finder` 且包含 3-6 个 query buckets + exclusions（可审计、可复跑）

title: HUMAN approve C0 (idea brief)
acceptance: 勾选 DECISIONS.md 的 Approve C0（确认 ideation brief 后才进入检索）

title: Collect candidate papers (multi-route) and normalize metadata
acceptance: papers_raw.jsonl 有足够覆盖（ideation Lite+：建议 >=800；不足则在 retrieval_report.md 说明并回到 queries.md 调整多桶检索）；每条含 title/year/url + 稳定标识（arxiv_id/doi）+ provenance；retrieval_report.md 记录 buckets/exclusions/缺失字段统计

title: Dedupe+rank and produce core set
acceptance: dedup 后池子足够大（建议 >=400）；core_set=100（默认；以 queries.md 的 core_size 为准）；paper_id 唯一且 title 非空

title: Build idea map (taxonomy; 2-level minimum) [NO PROSE]
acceptance: taxonomy 至少 2 层且节点有解释；用于 ideation map（而非论文大纲）

title: Draft C2 focus questions (choose 1-2 clusters)
acceptance: DECISIONS 含 C2 focus 选择提示（基于 taxonomy 列出候选簇；要求写明选择与排除项）

title: HUMAN approve C2 (focus clusters + exclusions)
acceptance: 勾选 DECISIONS.md 的 Approve C2（确认 focus 后才进入 ideation）

title: Write paper notes for core set (evidence substrate) [NO PROSE]
acceptance: core_set 覆盖率 100%；每篇至少 1 条 limitation/failure-mode（避免只产出“更强”点子）；无 TODO/省略号泄漏到 notes

title: Expand Idea Pool (operators + best-of-N)
acceptance: IDEA_SHORTLIST.md 含 Idea Pool：60-90 条；至少覆盖 6/8 个 operator family；每条含 tier+assumption+falsification；Tier-1/2 含 paper pointers（paper_id）

title: Curate shortlist (select→evaluate→subset→fuse)
acceptance: Final shortlist=7（默认；或按 brief 配置）；每条含 closest-3 + delta/non-delta + 1-week validation plan + failure criteria + >=2 risks + >=3 evidence pointers；组合覆盖 >=2-3 簇且 >=2 idea 类型

title: Self-loop idea shortlist to PASS (fix-on-fail)
acceptance: DELIVERABLE_SELFLOOP_TODO.md 为 PASS；shortlist 可执行且证据指针可追溯；Pool 多样性达标

title: Contract audit (artifact contract + target_artifacts)
acceptance: CONTRACT_REPORT.md 状态为 PASS（且无 DONE 输出缺失；target_artifacts 缺失=0）
